name: BeeWildered Demo
description:
BeeWildered is a video game based around the work-life of our buzziest and most essential flying insects - BEES!

The player must control a hive and the bees in it so that players can build up their environment, just as bees do naturally.

Play the BeeWildered demo here.

Team

Lead Designer: Pablo Obando

Producer: Randy Saint-Louis

Lead Programmer: Sherman Hewitt

Art/2-D: Brandon Wilson

Sound Designer: Catalina von Wrangell

Send all inquiries to beewilderedgame@gmail.com
